background_description: The background consists of dark green, rough, and algae-covered rocks. A coarser gravel substrate is visible in areas, and the water appears greenish and somewhat murky. There is also a smooth, light purplish-white stone/shell fragment to the lower right.
explanation: The shrimp exhibits a form of camouflage by having a semi-translucent body adorned with brownish speckles and stripes. This coloration and patterning allows it to blend with the greenish-brown, algae-covered rocks and irregular gravel textures in its immediate environment. The semi-transparency helps reduce its visual impact, while the mottled pattern helps disrupt its outline against the rough, textured background, creating a medium degree of color and texture similarity and reducing the overall contrast difference.
